channel.title: Need help with 2 things
channel.description:
First thing is this.. [code]client.java:27975: sendMessage(java.lang.String) in client cannot be applied to (java.lang.String,int) sendMessage("You Froze "+playerName+"!", 4906); ^[/code] I changed it so when u barrage someone it would say who u barraged. But my compile says whats above (error)
Second thing is this.. When i barrage someone the barrage is massive? how i change it so its smaller??
Thanks to who ever helps me.. And to the ones who try.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2007, 03:23:54 PM[/size][hr]:( someone please help.

item.title: Need help with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

The Ice Barrage is massive because it’s graphics have been set to that. Look for the spell and change the graphics to the normal barrage.
